Page.text: Tools required to have: Mortar and Pestle

Page.text: 1 Empty Vial, 3 Bones Powders, 3 Raw Meats, 1 Mead.
Tools required to have: Mortar and Pestle

Page.text: 1 Empty Vial, 2 Beaver Furs, 2 Silver Ores,
Tools required to have: Mortar and Pestle

Page.text: Tools required to have: Mortar and Pestle

Page.name: P_Will

Tools required to have: Mortar and Pestle

Page.text: Tools required to have: Mortar and Pestle

Tools required to have: Mortar and Pestle

Page.text: 1 Empty Vial, 1 Wine, 2 Blue Star Flowers, 1 Blue Quartz.
Tools required to have: Mortar and Pestle

Page.name: P_Extra_Mana
Page.text: It can also be made randomly when creating potions
of mana or potions of spirit restoration.
30 Ogre Toes, 15 Potions of Spirit Restoration,
Tools required to have: Mortar and Pestle
1 Binding stone, 2 Potions of Spirit Restoration.

Page.name: P_Extra_Life
Page.text: It can also be made randomly when creating potions
of minor healing or potions of body restoration.
Note: the process produces 30 potions at a time.
1 Binding stone, 2 Potions of Body Restoration.

Page.name: P_Antidote
Page.text: Removes any current poison from your body.
1 Empty Vial, 3 Rues, 10 Yarrows, 3 Poppies, 4 Ale.
Tools required to have: Mortar and Pestle

Page.name: P_TS
Page.text: Allows you to see invisible characters.
1 Empty Vial, 1 Deer Antlers, 9 Wormwoods, 7 Toadstools,
Tools required to have: Mortar and Pestle
Knowledge needed: Potion of True Sight

Page.name: P_Invis
Page.text: Make your character invisible, except to those
1 Empty Vial, 2 Ales, 2 Snow Leopard Furs, 7 Wormwoods
Tools required to have: Mortar and Pestle

Page.name: P_Accuracy
Page.text: Temporarily increases your ability to aim attacks.
1 Empty Vial, 3 Skunk Furs, 5 Valerians, 15 Dandelions,
Tools required to have: Mortar and Pestle

Page.name: P_Evasion
Page.text: Temporarily increases your ability to evade attacks.
1 Empty Vial, 10 Mulleins, 10 Yarrows, 4 Racoon Furs,
Tools required to have: Mortar and Pestle

Page.name: P_Alchemy
Page.text: 1 Empty Vial, 3 Feran Horns, 3 Mercury, 1 Wine,
Tools required to have: Mortar and Pestle

Page.name: P_Potion
Page.text: 1 Empty Vial, 2 Feran Horns, 1 Wine, 5 Rues, 7 Dandelions,
Tools required to have: Mortar and Pestle

Page.name: P_Eng
Page.text: 1 Empty Vial, 2 Hawk Feathers, 2 Falcon Feathers,
Tools required to have: Mortar and Pestle

Page.name: P_Cold
Page.text: 1 Empty Vial, 5 Polar Bear Furs, 8 Wines, 5 Rubies.
Tools required to have: Mortar and Pestle
Knowledge needed: Potion of Cold Protection

Page.name: P_Heat
Page.text: 1 Empty Vial, 8 Air Essences, 8 Water Essences,
Tools required to have: Mortar and Pestle
Knowledge needed: Potion of Heat Protection

Page.name: P_Rad
Page.text: 1 Empty Vial, 8 Energy Essences, 8 Air Essences,
Tools required to have: Mortar and Pestle
Knowledge needed: Potion of Radiation Protection

Page.name: P_Speed
Page.text: Doubles the walking speed, wears off when the
food level is -30. Every step can consume 1 food
point (the chance depends on the load compared
Note: the process produces 12 potions at a time.
12 Empty Vials, 1 Leonard fur, 1 Mixture of Power,
Tools required to have: Mortar and Pestle
Knowledge needed: Potion of Speed Hax

Page.name: P_Attack_Reduction
Page.text: Reduces attack by 5, the effect stacks up to -30.
Note: the process produces 12 potions at a time.
12 Empty Vials, 1 Red Dragon Scale, 12 Ales, 12 Wines.
Tools required to have: Mortar and Pestle
Knowledge needed: Potion of Attack Reduction

Page.name: P_Defense_Reduction
Page.text: Reduces defense by 5, the effect stacks up to -30.
Note: the process produces 12 potions at a time.
12 Empty Vials, 1 Black Dragon Scale, 12 Ales, 12 Wines.
Tools required to have: Mortar and Pestle
Knowledge needed: Potion of Defense Reduction

Page.name: P_Archery_AP
Page.text: PERMANENTLY increases your archery armor piercing

Page.name: C_Food
Page.text: Needed while being in shapeshifted form.
Note: the process produces 60 foods at a time.
1 Empty Vial, 1 Refined Vegetal Mixture, 15 Raw Meats.
Tools required to have: Mortar and Pestle

Page.text: 5 Red Currants - Blue Berries - Rue Extracts.

Page.name: Mixture_POW
Page.text: 5 White Chanterelle - Ogre Toes - Tree Mushroom Extracts,

Page.name: P_Action
Page.text: Note: Stores in magic section of storage.
Note: the process produces 40 potions at a time
Tools required to have: Mortar and Pestle
Knowledge needed: Potion of Action Points
